name: Yun Jin
storytext: Elegance on the stage, in decorous harmony.
source: Reward for inviting Yun Jin to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Opening Flourish
skills.descriptionraw: Creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116073]</color>, attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116071]</color> to this character and $[K53]: <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S16074]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Flying Cloud Flag Formation</color>, attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield of Swirling Clouds</color> to this character and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Prepare Skill</color>: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Spear Flourish</color>.
skills.description: Creates 1 Flying Cloud Flag Formation, attaches Shield of Swirling Clouds to this character and Prepare Skill: Spear Flourish.

skills.name: Cliffbreaker's Banner
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>, creates 3 stacks of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Flying Cloud Flag Formation</color>.
skills.description: Deals 3 Geo DMG, creates 3 stacks of Flying Cloud Flag Formation.

skills.name: Spear Flourish
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. If you have $[K56]ed or used at least 1 card for $[K57] this Round, this deals +1 DMG.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>. If you have <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color>ed or used at least 1 card for <color=#FFFFFFFF>Tune</color> this Round, this deals +1 DMG.
skills.description: Deals 2 Geo DMG. If you have Discarded or used at least 1 card for Tune this Round, this deals +1 DMG.
